name: FNaF Maker (Octoexus Studios)
description:
Uploading this here so no one else can i am the Current developer of fnaf maker any reuploads is against my wishes

Gamejolt page: https://gamejolt.com/games/FNaF_Maker/672709 (includes old builds)

In this game you use some assets to make a FNAF Game! You dont even need to code unless you want to do complicated stuff!

[UNDER NEW DEVELOPMENT]

Windows 7/8.1/10
We haven't tested any older versions (Windows XP)

You can add to your game:
Doors

Lights

Cameras

Masks

Animatronics (Of course haha)

FNAF Maker supports the LUA programming language to make it even more customize-able!
